website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a BMX bike designed specifically with girls in mind, look no further. Its durable build and eye-catching design also comes at a reasonable price.
pros: Designed for girls who love BMX bikes, thanks to the attractive styling and white tires
20-inch wheels are ideal for girls approximately 8 years old and up
Comes partially assembled and the remaining parts are easy to put together
cons: Rare occurrences of missing parts and bent wheels upon arrival have been noted

customer_reviews.title: Good bike with some small shortcomings
customer_reviews.text: The bike overall is good, but distance between seat and handles is a bit too much for a child of small or even medium build. Also, there is no free reverse pedal motion, which is not convenient for a child that is not very confident on a start.
customer_reviews.author: milenski

customer_reviews.title: Wheel doesn't fit!
customer_reviews.text: Front wheel doesn't fit on fork. It appears they used too wide of lock nuts against the bearing race. Had to modify and take lock nuts off a spare bike. Had a extremely difficult time removing the lock nuts and couldn't get one side loose.
customer_reviews.author: cujosocal

customer_reviews.title: Waste of my money
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had this bike for a month and has had nothing but issues with it. First the back breaks did not work properly and were cheaply made and we had to order a different pair because the bike was not safe when riding. Second the back wheel is bent and now shakes when she’s riding it. I did a lot of research prior to buying this bike and thought I was getting a decent bike. I was wrong. DO NOT waste your money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole hoch

customer_reviews.title: Super cute bike
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 8 year old. She loves it. Very well made. No problems. True to color. Super cute bike.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Malerich

customer_reviews.title: Solid, comfortable, stylish and most importantly my granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 10-11 year old granddaughter loves the bike. It is smart looking and is easy to ride. She's short person and this bike's style fits her well. And look at those snazzy white tires!!
customer_reviews.author: Don's Opinion

customer_reviews.title: My daughter's new home
customer_reviews.text: This is my daughter's first non-training wheel bike. Took a few attempts to get used to it, but now she lives on it!
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: No left pedal
customer_reviews.text: The bike is beautiful but arrived with 2 right pedals, and no left pedal. The second right pedal won't screw in. Please send the left pedal.
customer_reviews.author: L.Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!
customer_reviews.text: Great bike! My 8 year old loves it! Super easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality bicycle
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality bike. I would use wreches instead of tool that comes with the bike to make sure everything was tight.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I got this bike as a gift for my daughter for Christmas. The rim on the back tire is bent and it is now to late to return it. It is also making a clicking noise. Disappointed😕
customer_reviews.author: shannon smith

customer_reviews.title: Well built product
customer_reviews.text: Well packed and easy to assemble. Looked just as was presented in picture. Good bike for moving up from smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Jason E.

customer_reviews.title: Boo very poor
customer_reviews.text: The first bike was damagage. The second one was missing parts. Will never buy again. And you don't discover this until half way assembling the bike. Boo very poor
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Several pieces broke the first day my daughter rode it, including the brakes.
customer_reviews.author: Eric H. Mosier

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken and had to return. So sad because the colors were awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for our granddaughter's seventh birthday. She loves it
customer_reviews.author: RJM

customer_reviews.title: As good a bike as you could purchase from a bike shop
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bike for our granddaughter for Christmas and she loves it. It is as good a bike as the more expensive models that you can purchase from a bike shop. If you have growing kids you will save quite a bit on this purchase as opposed to buying a top end bike that might only be useable for a year. That was our problem from the previous Christmas. We bought a high end bike the previous Christmas and our granddaughter grew out of it in a year.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: New Bike Out of the Box With a Bent Rim!!
customer_reviews.text: I received the bike and assembled it today only to find that the rear tire rim is bent. I will change this review pending the outcome of getting a replacement. Currently I deem the bike unusable and unsafe.It won't be a Happy birthday for my child.
customer_reviews.author: Justin H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice bike looks well made. Granddaughter wanted a blue bike and picked out this one. Very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: GoofyNanny

customer_reviews.title: She loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Our 9 year old loves the bike, Its cute, and was fairly easy to assemble. I had a little difficulty with the handbrake.
customer_reviews.author: FocusOnWildlife

customer_reviews.title: Great bike, great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great bike, easy to put together and my daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Chris D Stallings

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: NOT TO HARD TO PUT TOGETHER, BRAKES TAKE THE LONGEST TIME.
customer_reviews.author: ben bernard

customer_reviews.title: Pretty bike, my 9 year old daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Pretty bike, my 9 year old daughter loves it. However, some spare parts fell in only 2 days. I had to take it to the bike shop for assembly. After that it works fine until now. So far so good, but I won't say it is excellent quality bike, it is OK, and it is pretty, that matters for girls.
customer_reviews.author: DZ

product_meta.title: Titan Tomcat 20-Inch Wheel Girls BMX Bike with Pads
product_meta.description: TITAN Tomcat 20-Inch Wheel Girls BMX Bike, this single speed bike includes a rear coaster brake and side-pull brake. It has adjustable handlebars and saddle height, BMX Style tires, and extreme Graphics! This girls bmx bike arrives 85% assembled to your door.
feature_bullets: 20-Inch Wheel Girls BMX Bicycle, Single Speed with Coaster Brake and Side-pull rear brake (Training Wheels Not Included.
Heavy-duty, high-tensile steel frame and fork. White BMX tires. Great girls bike for first time riders.
20-inch wheels have 36 spokes with 28-hole, chrome-plated rims and hubs; Actual Tires and Tubes.
This blue BMX bike is recommended for girls between the ages of 7-12 years old.
Includes limited one-year manufacturer's warranty; Arrives 85% assembled

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
